meanings.definition: The position or role of an inspector.
meanings.sent1: In the inspectorship, he was responsible for checking the safety of the building.
meanings.sent2: She was promoted to the inspectorship after years of hard work.
meanings.sent3: During the inspectorship, he found a hidden treasure in the old house.
meanings.sent4: The inspectorship was like being a detective, searching for clues in every corner.
meanings.sent5: The inspectorship required keen observation and attention to detail.

meanings.definition: The act of inspecting or examining something.
meanings.sent1: The inspectorship of the car revealed several mechanical issues.
meanings.sent2: Regular inspectorship of the equipment ensured its proper functioning.
meanings.sent3: The inspectorship of the cake before the party saved it from disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her thorough inspectorship of the documents uncovered a crucial mistake.
meanings.sent5: The inspectorship of the museum artifacts was meticulous and thorough.
